transcript:
to Tikhon. 
"Ah! here's the warrior! Wants to vanquish Buonaparte?" said the old man, shaking his powdered head as much as the tail, which Tik- hon was holding fast to plait, would allow. 
"You at least must tackle him properly, or else if he goes on like this he'll soon have us, too, for his subjects! How are you?" And he held out his cheek. 
The old man was in a good temper after his nap before dinner. (He used to say that a nap "after dinner was silver before dinner, gold- en.") He cast happ
